testcase.name: TC17 iFrame otomasyon testi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUniFrameUrl" anasayfaya gider...........................passed And ourProduct linkine tiklamak icin iFrame'e gecis yapar...................passed And Our Products butonuna basar.............................................passed Then acilan sayfada Cameras'i tiklar........................................passed And 1 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And Popup mesajini yazdirir.................................................passed And close butonuna basar....................................................passed Then iFrame'den cikis yapar.................................................passed And WebdriverUniversity.com (IFrame) linkini tiklar.........................passed And acilan sayfa url'inin "https://webdriveruniversity.com/index.html" oldugunu test eder.passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
